pr_title: Handle spurious failure were rename succeeded but reported it failed (#1588)

timeline.message:
Fix #1588 Refine rename During Minor Compaction (1588)
PR addresses a few issues:
Spurious rename failures where rename failed but actually succeeded
The check for file existence should only be done before attempting rename
Should not delete file if it exists (an admin may want to investigate).

timeline.author: arvindshmicrosoft

replies.bodyText: @arvindshmicrosoft I have removed the comment & fixed the curly brace.
replies.author: tushardhadiwal
